structures

Class MovableCircularShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.CircularShape
      • structures.MovableCircularShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball

    public abstract class MovableCircularShape
extends CircularShape
    Abstraction for Circular Shapes that are movable. Adds support for velocity.
    Author:
    Sean Lewis
